Seedling

Modern mobile multi-language literacy

Get started What is Seedling?

Audio-to-word multiple choice

Listen to the pronunciation and tap the matching word-tile

Audio-to-word matching

Match up blue audio-tiles with white word-tiles

Explanation-to-word multiple-choice

Read the explanation and choose the correct word

Explanation-to-word matching

Match up blue explanation-tiles with white word-tiles

Single-blank cloze

Fill-the-blank with the appropriate word

Multi-blank cloze

Fill-the-blank exercise with multiple blanks and corresponding words

# What is Seedling?

Seedling is a digital learning tool for adults; a collection of exercise templates that bundled content can use to present curated lessons for first-language learners.

Li Ai Educationopen in new window used Seedling to make 立爱种字open in new window, to help Standard Chinese (Putonghua)open in new window speaking adults learn to read simplified Chinese characters.

# Get involved

Visit the Seedling project on GitHubopen in new window to contribute or interact with the community.

# Community

Engage the community and ask questions in Seedling discussionsopen in new window. Please stop by and say hi.

# Code of conduct

Help us keep the Seedling community open and positive. Participate in the spirit of the Seedling Code of Conductopen in new window and the GitHub Community Guidelinesopen in new window.

# Contributing

We would love to collaborate with you to make features and content available to the people you care about. Read through our contributing guidelinesopen in new window and get working on it!
